cgcloud__Order_Item_Rule__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Item_Rule__c
cgcloud__Order_Item_Rule__c.description: Defines the rules handled by the pricing engine during the complex pricing calculation.

cgcloud__Effect__c.description: Defines how the order item template affects the reference value determination.

cgcloud__Item_Meta_Rule__c.description: Defines how the rules apply to the order item template.

cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c.description: Reference to the order item template object.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the order item rule record.
